titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY TEST REQUESTED BY) - Description

body.p: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY TEST REQUESTED BY) is the same as attribute PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY CODE .
PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY TEST REQUESTED BY) is the code which identifies the PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY of the CARE PROFESSIONAL who requested the pathology test.
